subtitles.original:
バズビバザザ
作詞・作曲・編曲：てにをは
subtitles.english:
Buzz Be Bazar
Lyrics, Composition, Arrangement: Teniwoha

subtitles.original: 昔々悪魔の娘が 顔のない国に作ったとさ
subtitles.english: Once upon a time, a devil's daughter created a faceless country.

subtitles.original: やがて多くの人々が集い 賑わった
subtitles.english: Soon many people gathered and it became lively.

subtitles.original: 娘はいたく喜び 受け入れたが 顔のない人々は
subtitles.english: The daughter was greatly pleased and accepted them, but the faceless people...

subtitles.original: 自ら神を名乗り始めた
subtitles.english: ...began to call themselves gods.

subtitles.original: Talk to, talk to devil, talk to talk
subtitles.english: Talk to, talk to devil, talk to talk

subtitles.original: 顔のない神様の言う通り 供物は迷い子達の邪気
subtitles.english: Just as the faceless gods say, the offerings are the malice of lost children

subtitles.original: あれが欲しい これが欲しい 暴れては駄々こねる
subtitles.english: I want that, I want this, raging and throwing tantrums

subtitles.original: バズビバザブ そろそろ 分からせていこう
subtitles.english: Buzz Be Bazar, it's about time to make them understand

subtitles.original: 瞬く間に あっちゅう間に 悪魔に びるびる悪魔に
subtitles.english: In the blink of an eye, in no time, a devil, a quivering devil

subtitles.original: 瞬く間に あっちゅう間に 悪魔に あくまで悪魔に
subtitles.english: In the blink of an eye, in no time, a devil, strictly a devil

subtitles.original: 強烈な洗礼浴びせ 奇跡をご覧あれ
subtitles.english: Giving a intense baptism, behold the miracle

subtitles.original: Buzz B, Buzz B, over!
subtitles.english: Buzz B, Buzz B, over!

subtitles.original: 滑稽にクラクラするほど 色付くは 何これ 邪魔だから
subtitles.english: Comically dizzying, it turns colorful, what's this? It's in the way

subtitles.original: 絡みついた邪魔なモノ 外しちゃお 真っ向から 歌い踊る
subtitles.english: Let's remove the entangled nuisances, singing and dancing head-on

subtitles.original: 当たり障り
subtitles.english: Harmlessly

subtitles.original: やばくない？ 混ざってない？ 声合わせ 唱えましょう

subtitles.original: バズビバザブ Super God Stage Time
subtitles.english: Buzz Be Bazar, Super God Stage Time
